import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { MoreHorizontal, Users, Star } from 'lucide-react'; import '../../css/teacher/CourseSummaryCard.css'; const CourseSummaryCard = ({ course }) => { const [showMenu, setShowMenu] = useState(false); return (
Updated {course.lastUpdated}

{course.title}

{showMenu && (
Edit Course View Course Manage Students Course Settings Delete
)}
{course.enrolled} Students
{course.rating}
); }; export default CourseSummaryCard;
